statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ 4 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -5 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 5 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -6 \\ -10 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -5 \\ -4 \\ 4 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -5 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 5 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 2 \\ -6 \\ -10 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
